2020-09-will-mother.title: Mother’s will naming Adam
2020-09-will-mother.summary: Mother’s death; a will naming Adam.
2020-09-will-mother.details: In September 2020, Adam’s mother passed away and left a will naming Adam. No court dispute was recorded at that time.

2021-04-father-dx-will.title: Father’s will confirmed
2021-04-father-dx-will.summary: A will in Adam’s favor confirmed before the father’s death.
2021-04-father-dx-will.details: By April 2021, Adam’s father had executed a will in Adam’s favor; this document was later confirmed. Medical information about third parties is omitted in the public version.

2021-07-father-death-claims.title: Father’s death; claims filed to contest the wills
2021-07-father-death-claims.summary: Relatives filed claims contesting the parents’ wills.
2021-07-father-death-claims.details: In July 2021, after the father’s death, claims were filed to contest the parents’ wills. As proceedings commenced, temporary restrictions were imposed pending review.

2021-07-asset-freeze.title: Court-ordered asset freeze and restrictions
2021-07-asset-freeze.summary: Freeze on accounts and real estate remains in force.
2021-07-asset-freeze.details: By court order, bank accounts and real estate were frozen with associated restrictions. The freeze remains in force.

2021-09-apartment-dispute.title: Dispute over use of Adam’s apartment
2021-09-apartment-dispute.summary: Usage dispute during the period of asset freeze.
2021-09-apartment-dispute.details: During a medical trip, a dispute arose over use of Adam’s apartment. Access issues were tied to the existing freeze and subsequent procedural steps.

2021-11-prelim-scheduled.title: Preliminary hearing scheduled
2021-11-prelim-scheduled.details: The court scheduled a preliminary hearing in the inheritance case for July 2024.

2022-03-hearing-travel.title: Hearing on permission to travel for treatment
2022-03-hearing-travel.summary: Court considered permission to travel abroad for therapy.
2022-03-hearing-travel.details: The court considered granting Adam permission to travel abroad for therapy. Objections were filed by the plaintiffs; a forensic medical examination was conducted.

2022-03-permission-travel.title: Permission to travel for treatment granted
2022-03-permission-travel.summary: Court allowed travel abroad for therapy.
2022-03-permission-travel.details: The court granted Adam’s motion and allowed travel abroad to undergo therapy.

2022-05-visit-med-exam.title: Incident at residence; court clarifications on examinations
2022-05-visit-med-exam.summary: Court confirmed: examinations require consent or a legal basis.
2022-05-visit-med-exam.details: An incident at Adam’s residence led to police involvement. The court clarified that mandatory medical examinations are possible only with consent or another legal basis. Restrictive measures regarding access were applied.

2024-06-eviction-start.title: Eviction initiated regarding a relative
2024-06-eviction-start.summary: Eviction process initiated; later reviewed by the court.
2024-06-eviction-start.details: At the end of June 2024, an eviction process was initiated against a relative occupying Adam’s apartment. The court later found no procedural violations in the filing.

2024-07-docs-fee.title: Documents filed; court fee paid
2024-07-docs-fee.summary: Procedural documents filed; mandatory fee paid.
2024-07-docs-fee.details: Before the preliminary hearing, procedural documents were filed. The mandatory court fee was paid (amount withheld in the public version).

2024-07-prelim-hearing.title: Preliminary hearing; scenarios outlined
2024-07-prelim-hearing.summary: Court outlined possible outcomes; settlement talks noted.
2024-07-prelim-hearing.details: At the preliminary hearing, the court outlined possible scenarios for the inheritance dispute. Settlement discussions did not yield a result.

2024-07-motion-freeze-relatives.title: Motion regarding relatives’ accounts
2024-07-motion-freeze-relatives.summary: Request filed for freezes and transaction review.
2024-07-motion-freeze-relatives.details: A motion was filed to freeze relatives’ accounts and review transactions. The court accepted the motion for consideration.

2024-08-relatives-freeze.title: Court order on relatives’ accounts
2024-08-relatives-freeze.details: The court granted a freeze on relatives’ accounts for verification within the ongoing case.

2025-07-unfreeze-motion.title: Motion to modify the asset freeze
2025-07-unfreeze-motion.summary: Request filed for full or partial modification of restrictions.
2025-07-unfreeze-motion.details: A motion was filed to fully or partially modify the asset freeze on grounds related to health and treatment. Medical details and internal positions of representatives are omitted in the public version.

2026-11-hearing-scheduled.title: Hearing on the motion scheduled
2026-11-hearing-scheduled.summary: Court set a hearing for November 2026.
2026-11-hearing-scheduled.details: According to the case docket, the court scheduled a hearing on the motion for November 2026.
